Ingredients.1: 0.25 pounds red potatoes, cut into chunks

Ingredients.5: 4 cups frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, green beans, peas), thawed

Ingredients.8: 0.75 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat or KNUDSEN Light Sour Cream

Ingredients.9: 0.5 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, divided

Directions.1: Cook potatoes and garlic in boiling water in large saucepan 20 min. or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, brown meat in large nonstick skillet. Stir in flour; cook 1 min. Add mixed vegetables, broth and ketchup; cook 5 min., stirring frequently.

Directions.2: Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Drain potatoes; return to pan. Add sour cream; mash until potatoes are smooth and mixture is well blended. Stir in 1/4 cup cheese.

Directions.3: Spoon meat mixture into 8-inch square baking dish; cover with potatoes.

Directions.4: BAKE 18 min. Top with remaining cheese; bake 2 min. or until melted.
